title: dev-box Documentation
description: Comprehensive documentation for the dev-box development environment platform - Your complete guide to isolated Ubuntu 24.04 development sandboxes

features.title: Isolated Environments
features.description: Create clean Ubuntu 24.04 development environments with complete isolation from your host system

features.title: Vagrant & Libvirt
features.description: Built on proven virtualization technologies with support for VirtualBox and Libvirt/KVM

features.title: Safety First
features.description: Comprehensive safety features including snapshots, rollback capabilities, and resource monitoring

features.title: Developer Friendly
features.description: Pre-configured with essential development tools, automated provisioning, and extensive documentation
